extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereq: Level 4 & reg in SOCY MAJ or MED & (a min grade of C in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226 & SOCY227) & (a min GPA of 2.60 in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226, SOCY227 & (a min GPA of 2.60 in all units in SOCY).

basic.description: Examination of social implications of communication and information technology in the context of sociological theory.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Advanced Studies in Communication and Information Technology
